metadata.description: Asha framework plugins and tools for creative writing, TTRPG, and AAS universe development

plugins.name: panel
plugins.description: Dynamic multi-perspective analysis with 3 core roles (Asha, Recruiter, Adversary) + recruited specialists. Recruiter analyzes topic and assigns 2-5 specialist agents with session-specific names.

plugins.name: memory-session-manager
plugins.description: Memory file maintenance and session capture/save workflow for multi-session AI projects. Provides /save command, automatic session watching via hooks, and memory-maintenance skill for frontmatter schema guidance.
